name: Crash Bandicoot
overview: Experience the game that revolutionized 3D platforming on Playstation! When Dr. Neo Cortex's plan to use Crash Bandicoot as part of his world domination army fails, Crash manages to escape but in the confusion leaves his girlfriend Tanya behind. Now washed up on N. Sanity Beach, Crash teams up with ancient spirit Aku-Aku in order to fight his way back to Cortex's lair in order to save Tanya from the same fate Crash narrowly avoided. With 32 levels of 3D platforming mayhem and gems to collect don't expect any mercy.
